chatGptLabel: Brand recognition campaign FB 6 editorial sections
promptPrefix:
[TARGETLANGUAGE] Englihs [PROMPT] As an expert in digital marketing and communication develops a brand recognition campaign, through an editorial line focused on the Facebook audience with 6 clearly defined sections.
I give you the name of the brand: By Sibarita
Brand mission: To highlight the manufacturing processes and materials that have prevailed over time and are a guarantee of quality in today's decorative arts.
Brand Vision: To offer an integral solution of well-being to the client with pieces for their home.
Customer profile: Host at home with friends, 25 to 34 years old and 69.8% female.
Pain points: Lack of time or resources to prepare the event.
Desire points: People who want to build a reputation as exceptional hosts.
title: Brand recognition campaign FB 6 editorial sections
